name: Cleaning
description: Residential and commercial cleaning services including deep cleaning, move-in/move-out, and specialized surface cleaning.

name: Assembly
description: Furniture assembly, shelving installation, and equipment setup for home and office.

name: Gardening & Landscaping
description: Lawn care, garden maintenance, landscaping, tree trimming, and outdoor beautification.

name: Moving & Hauling
description: Local moving, furniture rearrangement, junk removal, and heavy lifting assistance.

name: Seasonal
description: Season-specific services including snow removal, gutter cleaning, holiday decorating, and winterization.

name: Pet Care
description: Dog walking, pet sitting, basic grooming, and pet-related household tasks.

name: Painting
description: Interior and exterior painting, surface preparation, staining, and decorative finishes.

name: Errands & Delivery
description: Shopping errands, package pickup and delivery, waiting in line, and personal assistant tasks.

name: Events
description: Event setup and teardown, party assistance, venue preparation, and catering support.

name: Plumbing
description: Plumbing repair, installation, drain clearing, fixture replacement, and water system maintenance.

name: Electrical
description: Electrical repair, panel work, wiring, lighting installation, and power system upgrades.

name: HVAC
description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning installation, repair, and maintenance.
